name: The Ice Princess
overview: A shareware game from Rudiger Hanke created with Mipric in 1994. In this fairytale adventure you take the role of an unhappy, runaway orphan boy. The game starts on a cold Christmas Eve morning in a snow covered landscape in some faraway village. Standing near a frozen lake, you suddenly see the most beautiful young girl you have ever seen, and you immediately fall head over heels in love with her! Your task becomes to find this "princess" who has stolen your heart.
